label: FZF File Finder
command: PATH=/opt/homebrew/bin:$PATH; cd "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT" && EXCLUDE_DIRS=('node_modules' '.git' 'dist' 'build' 'coverage' '.next' '.nuxt' '.cache' '.turbo' 'target' 'vendor' '__pycache__'); FD_EXCLUDES=(); for dir in "${EXCLUDE_DIRS[@]}"; do FD_EXCLUDES+=(-E "$dir"); done; result=$(fd -t f -I "${FD_EXCLUDES[@]}" | fzf --preview-window=right:60% --preview='bat --style=numbers --color=always {}') && [ -n "$result" ] && zed "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT/$result"

label: FZF Text Search
command: PATH=/opt/homebrew/bin:$PATH; cd "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT" && EXCLUDE_DIRS=('node_modules' '.git' 'dist' 'build' 'coverage' '.next' '.nuxt' '.cache' '.turbo' 'target' 'vendor' '__pycache__'); EXCLUDE_FILES=('*.min.js' '*.min.css' 'package-lock.json' 'yarn.lock' 'pnpm-lock.yaml'); RG_EXCLUDES=(); for item in "${EXCLUDE_DIRS[@]}" "${EXCLUDE_FILES[@]}"; do RG_EXCLUDES+=(-g "!$item"); done; result=$(rg --no-ignore --smart-case --line-number --no-heading --color=always "${RG_EXCLUDES[@]}" "${ZED_SELECTED_TEXT:-}" . | fzf --exact --ansi --query "${ZED_SELECTED_TEXT:-}" --delimiter : --nth 3.. --preview 'bat --style=numbers --color=always --highlight-line {2} {1}') && [ -n "$result" ] && file=$(echo "$result" | cut -d: -f1) && line=$(echo "$result" | cut -d: -f2) && zed "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT/$file:$line"
